actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

official_title: To exempt breastfeeding women from jury duty, and for other purposes.
short_title: Breastfeeding Mothers Jury Duty Exclusion Act of 2022

summary.text:
Breastfeeding Mothers Jury Duty Exclusion Act of 2022 

This bill allows breastfeeding women to be excused from jury duty in federal or D.C. court upon request by the individual.

titles.title: Breastfeeding Mothers Jury Duty Exclusion Act of 2022
Breastfeeding Mothers Jury Duty Exclusion Act of 2022
